Installation¶

Stable release¶

To install neo-python-rpc, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install neo-python-rpc

This is the preferred method to install neo-python-rpc, as it will always install the most recent stable release.

If you don’t have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process.

From sources¶

The sources for neo-python-rpc can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

$ git clone git://github.com/CityOfZion/neo-python-rpc

Or download the tarball:

$ curl  -OL https://github.com/CityOfZion/neo-python-rpc/tarball/master

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

$ python setup.py install
